Reviews.Title: Non-standard connectors
Reviews.Author: Eric Low "ericll75"
Reviews.Content: Watch out, these cameras do NOT use standard BNC/female DC power connectors!  Instead, they have an RJ12 connection (like a 6-pin telephone cord), so you will most likely have to purchase the Revo RJ12 to BNC/DC adapters for another $10 each.  I haven't tested the cameras yet, since I have to wait for these adapters to arrive, so I can't say how well the cameras themselves work at this time.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: manish j bhakta
Reviews.Content: great cameras for th price.  I have 9 camersa total and this is a great product.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Good indoor cameras
Reviews.Author: sk92069
Reviews.Content: I use these cameras in door where the picture is clear with objects 10 to 30 feet away. I like the night vision, it works well.

ProductInfo.Features:
2-pack of Super High Resolution Color Dome Cameras
Power consumption: max 4 Watts (IR LED on)
LED lighting distance: max 80ft
Auto exposure, white balance, gain control and day and night
Built in microphone for audio monitoring capability
ProductInfo.Name: Revo RCDS30-2BNDL 600TVL Indoor Dome Surveillance Cameras with 80-Feet Night Vision (2-Pack)
